name: 601 - Kryptonite - Churchill
additionalNotes: 601 Kryptonite cigars join the 601 cigars collection as a complement to the 601 Steel cigars line. Superman, "Man of Steel", the superhero who's weakened by Kryptonite. You see the connection? Well, there's nothing weak about this full-flavored line extension from Erik Espinosa. Made at his La Zona factory in Estel√≠, Nicaragua, this all-Nicaraguan blend is seamlessly rolled in oily Habano wrappers. Although the name might suggest that this cigar going to pack a meteor-like punch, the 601 Kryptonite leans more to the medium-bodied side. Teeming with bold, well-balanced flavors of earthy spice, black pepper and a smack of sweetness.
